Articles.Content: Multiple attempts to upload a file to Curse's service resulting in a time-out every time is unacceptable rubbish. I'm surprised any modder of KSP uses this service. I've run out of patience with it already. Squad, reconsider this partnership, thanks.
We already have a thread for Curse issues. Please provide as much debugging info as you can in a post there, but do not expect Squad's partnership to be reconsidered.
You have a REPLY, AlphaAsh. I'm sorry for your dissatisfaction with the service. I at least recommend working with Jadedcat on this to see if there's a larger issue at play.
